entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PanUpdatedEventArgs should provide you with some way of get the current window-relative position of the pan gesture #19914
  • Network connection gets terminated on iOS when the app goes background #19913
  • [Proposal] Add a new public API to allow defining TypedBinding in code #19912
  • Map Control, adding large number of pins issue #19906
  • Make the HideSoftInputOnTappedChangedManager class public #19905
  • [Android] ResfreshView IsEnabled not working #19897
    Backlog
  • Error when building MAUI project in visual studio: WMC0001 Unknown type 'xxx' in XML namespace 'http://schemas.microsoft.com/dotnet/2021/maui' #19896
  • [iOS] UIBarButtonItem custom font #19895
  • "System.IO.FileNotFoundException: Could not find System.Private.CoreLib.dll" in Release-mode MAUI application #19894
  • [MAUI]When you double-click a page on Android, you must return twice before you can return to the original page. #19893
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]For G2, pressing enter without entering any text can make the label turn green. #19892
    Backlog
  • Back button disabled second time FlyoutPage #19891
    Backlog
  • The parameter is incorrect. The parameter is incorrect. #19888
    Triaged

Closed

  • Font not found in Android, but works well in Windows. #19596
  • Not able to change NavigationBarDividerColor on android platform #19789
  • [macOS] [8.0] Hybrid app crashed after launch on macOS 12.4 #19904
  • [net7.0][iOS] TitleView contents appear partially above the top of the screen #14670
  • [Android] Button text alignment inconsistencies #14712
    Backlog
  • [iOS] error MAUI0000: System.MissingMethodException: Method not found #19899
  • Show output for Release applications on Android #6824
  • Xamarin Forms Namespace Caused Failure to Generate Code Behind and Compile ALL XAML Files #18637
  • [WinUI3] Cannot publish Windows MSIX when referencing class libraries and using Unit Test project workaround; #18818
  • Xaml hot reload not working on VS Mac Could not resolve type with token 01000062 from typeref (expected class 'System.AppDomain' #17615
  • "Codesign" exited with code 1 issue when try to build iOS app using visual studio 2022 for mac. #17612
  • Impossible to use MAUI win app outside of Visual Studio #15067
  • Visual Studio freezes with "Loading document..." message after saving XAML file #18069
  • When net8 app reference net7 project, breakpoint in net7 not work on Android #17564
  • After Visual Studio for MAC Update My App Crash On Launch on IOS #16362
  • VS 2022 Maui is does not give the option for the GoogleServiceJson build action #14486
  • hot reload #18018
  • MAUI Helloworld - NuGet packages restore process Error #18509
  • Can't create new projects - value cannot be null. (Parameter 'installation') #18833
  • Add cross-platform lifecycle events #19869
  • Shell is a biggest problem/bug in MAUI. #19887

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Developer Tools option setting for Blazor Hybrid Mac Catalyst view. #19909
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #19907
  • Fix modal page push in immersive mode #19903
    community ✨
  • Allow PathFigureCollection to string conversion via converter #19889
    community ✨

Merged

  • `sealed` some `internal` classes in `Controls.Core` that are not inherited from (2) #17671
    area/architecture, community ✨, stale
  • Fix Android MediaPicker Photo capture logic #19844
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8 #19898
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [xamlg] improve error for Xamarin.Forms namespace #19683
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Update README.md #19797
    area/docs 📓

Updated

  • [iOS] Set text color of unselected TabbedPage tabs #18777
    community ✨, stale
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test G1 #18616
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Fixed CollectionView reordering last item #17825
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Avoid zero-length array allocations #19300
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, stale
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix gesture crash navigating #19517
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/gestures
  • Fix OnPlatform + Setter when no match for current platform #17061
    area/Xaml </>, stale, .NET 8 SR2
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, stale, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, stale, Under Consideration
  • Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #19048
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Update MSBuild.StructuredLogger #19824
    community ✨
  • Fix the OnNavigatedTo event and the OnAppearing event to return the ScrollToAsync method call #16619
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, stale, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration
  • fix - 12469 - android refreshview isrefreshing binding #18273
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, stale
  • Resizetizer Regex Fix #19600
    area/single project ☝️, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
